title: Easy Banana Bread
directions: Combine all ingredients into large mixing bowl & beat well on med-high for approximately 30-45 seconds, or until it has the consistency of cake batter.
Pour into greased 13x9 glass baking dish.
Bake for 30-35 minutes or until deep golden brown & springy when you push slightly on top.
ingredients: ½ cup vegetable or canola oil
